title: WaveSeg‐UNet model for overlapped nuclei segmentation from multi‐organ histopathology images
details: HU Khan, B Raza, MAI Khan, M Faheem - CAAI Transactions on Intelligence …, 2024
abstract: Nuclei segmentation is a challenging task in histopathology images. It is challenging due to the small size of objects, low contrast, touching boundaries, and complex structure of nuclei. Their segmentation and counting play an important role in cancer …
